summary: This is an email chain from November 2021 regarding the Finest Foundation Awards ceremony on November 9, 2021. It congratulates two investigators from the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation and Human Trafficking Task Force for their work on the Epstein case and informs them of the award details.

persons.name: Det
persons.context: One of the investigators being congratulated and awarded for work on the Epstein case. Mentioned as a recipient of the Finest Foundation Award.

persons.name: Detective
persons.context: A detective mentioned in the email chain, likely a point of contact for the award ceremony RSVP.

connections.description: Both are investigators on the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation and Human Trafficking Task Force who worked on the Epstein case and are being recognized together with an award.

events.title: Finest Foundation Awards Ceremony
events.description: An awards ceremony held at 1 PP Auditorium where investigators from the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation and Human Trafficking Task Force, including those who worked on the Epstein case, were honored.

keyFacts: Two investigators, Det and SA, from the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation and Human Trafficking Task Force were awarded for their work on the Epstein case in November 2021.
The award ceremony was the Finest Foundation Awards, held on November 9, 2021, at 1 PP Auditorium.
The email chain demonstrates ongoing recognition and institutional support for law enforcement personnel involved in the Epstein investigation years after the case became public.
